consulting:business-consulting.heading: Data-Driven & Measurable Approach
consulting:business-consulting.intro: Every consulting engagement is backed by data, benchmarks, and performance metrics. We define clear KPIs from the start so progress is measurable, transparent, and aligned with your business objectives.

steps.title: Strategic Clarity with Execution Support
steps.description: Unlike traditional consulting firms that stop at recommendations, Atorix actively supports implementation. We work closely with leadership and teams to ensure strategies are adopted, executed, and optimized over time.

steps.title: Customer-Centric & Scalable Solutions
steps.description: We design business strategies and processes that improve internal efficiency while enhancing customer experience. Our solutions are scalable, enabling businesses to grow without operational bottlenecks.

steps.title: Trust, Transparency & Long-Term Partnership
steps.description: We believe in honest communication, realistic timelines, and sustainable growth. Our goal is to build long-term partnerships based on trust, accountability, and consistent value delivery.

sap-application:sap-business-one-support.heading: Support Delivery Model — Your Success, Our Responsibility
sap-application:sap-business-one-support.intro: Our SAP Business One support services follow a structured, transparent engagement model:

steps.title: Onboarding & Knowledge Transfer
steps.description: We begin with support onboarding to understand your system landscape, user roles, workflows, and pain points. This helps accelerate first response times and reduce resolution cycles.

steps.title: SLA-Driven Incident Management
steps.description: We operate under defined SLAs that match your business criticality — ensuring rapid response, consistent tracking, and clear resolution timelines.

steps.title: Proactive Monitoring & Alerts
steps.description: Our team configures monitoring and alerting to identify system anomalies and performance degradation early, reducing business impact.

steps.title: Continuous Improvement & Reporting
steps.description: Regular support reviews and actionable metrics help refine your SAP Business One environment and reduce recurring issues.

sap-application:sap-ecc-s4-hana-support.heading: Our SAP Support Delivery Model
sap-application:sap-ecc-s4-hana-support.intro: Atorix follows a structured, transparent, and scalable support framework:

steps.title: Support Onboarding
steps.description: Knowledge transfer, system walkthroughs, and SLA alignment

steps.title: Stabilization Phase
steps.description: Immediate issue resolution and environment familiarization

steps.title: SteadyState Support
steps.description: Proactive monitoring, incident management, and user support

steps.title: Continuous Improvement
steps.description: Performance insights, minor enhancements, and process refinement

sap-application:sap-business-one-impleme.heading: Our SAP Business One Implementation Approach
sap-application:sap-business-one-impleme.intro: Atorix follows a structured, experience-driven implementation methodology that ensures predictable outcomes, minimal risk, and high user adoption.

steps.title: Discovery & Business Needs Analysis
steps.description: We begin by understanding your current processes, pain points, and business goals. Through workshops and stakeholder discussions, we map your process flows, chart key requirements, and define success criteria. This phase creates a solid foundation for all implementation activities.

steps.title: Solution Design & Blueprinting
steps.description: Based on the discovery insights, we design a detailed blueprint that covers system configuration, master data structure, reporting needs, user roles, and integration points. Our focus is to preserve business context while leveraging SAP Business One best practices.

steps.title: Configuration & Setup
steps.description: Our consultants configure SAP Business One to match your business model — including financial structures, inventory parameters, sales logic, purchasing processes, and production rules. We ensure the system setup aligns with your governance, compliance, and growth strategy.

steps.title: Data Migration & Validation
steps.description: Accurate data is critical for ERP success. We assist with data extraction, cleansing, transformation, and migration from legacy systems, spreadsheets, or other sources. Rigorous validation ensures data integrity and continuity post go-live.

steps.title: Testing & Quality Assurance
steps.description: To ensure reliability, we conduct multiple levels of testing — unit, integration, and user acceptance testing (UAT). We validate configurations, workflows, master data integrity, and transactional accuracy before production deployment.

steps.title: User Training & Adoption
steps.description: We deliver structured training programs tailored to user roles and job functions. Our training ensures your teams are confident using SAP Business One effectively from day one, enhancing productivity and reducing support overhead.

steps.title: Go-Live & Stabilization Support
steps.description: Our team provides hands-on support during go-live and early operations. We monitor system performance, validate critical processes, and quickly resolve any issues to ensure a smooth transition. Post-go-live tuning and hypercare support ensure stability and user confidence.

information-technology:it-consulting.heading: Our IT Consulting Approach
information-technology:it-consulting.intro: Atorix follows a structured, business-first consulting methodology:

steps.title: Assess
steps.description: Analyze business goals, IT landscape, risks, and opportunities.

steps.title: Define
steps.description: Create a tailored IT strategy and solution roadmap.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Architect scalable, secure, and efficient technology solutions.

steps.title: Implement
steps.description: Support execution with technical guidance and governance.

steps.title: Optimize
steps.description: Continuously improve performance, costs, and outcomes. This approach ensures sustainable, value-driven results.

security:cyber-security.heading: Our Cyber Security Approach
security:cyber-security.intro: Atorix follows a multi-layered, defense-in-depth methodology that is aligned with industry frameworks such as NIST, ISO, and CIS Controls:

steps.title: Discover
steps.description: Understand assets, threats, and business goals.

steps.title: Protect
steps.description: Implement security controls, hardening, and architecture.

steps.title: Detect
steps.description: Establish monitoring and threat intelligence.

steps.title: Respond
steps.description: Contain and remediate active threats.

steps.title: Recover
steps.description: Rebuild, learn, and improve resilience. This iterative

steps.title: Discovery & Planning
steps.description: We understand your business goals, users, and technical requirements.

steps.title: Solution Architecture & Design
steps.description: We design scalable, secure, and future-ready architectures.

steps.title: Agile Development
steps.description: Iterative development with transparency and continuous feedback.

steps.title: Quality Assurance
steps.description: Rigorous testing to ensure performance, security, and reliability.

steps.title: Deployment & Support
steps.description: Smooth deployment with ongoing maintenance and enhancements. ve model ensures continual improvement and measurable security outcomes.

steps.title: SAP S/4HANA Implementation
steps.description: Greenfield and brownfield implementations designed to modernize core business processes and enable real-time analytics.

steps.title: SAP ECC to S/4HANA Migration
steps.description: Safe and structured migration approaches including system conversion, landscape transformation, and selective data transition.

steps.title: SAP Upgrade & Optimization
steps.description: Upgrade existing SAP systems to improve performance, stability, and functionality.

steps.title: SAP Integration Services
steps.description: Seamless integration of SAP with third-party systems, cloud platforms, and enterprise applications.

steps.title: SAP Support & Managed Services
steps.description: Ongoing SAP application support, enhancements, and performance monitoring to ensure system stability.

steps.title: SAP Business One Consulting
steps.description: ERP solutions tailored for small and mid-sized businesses looking for scalability and control.

erp-tech:sap-business-one-hana.heading: Our SAP Business One & HANA Services

steps.title: Cloud & On-Premise Implementation
steps.description: Design, configure, and deploy SAP Business One on HANA — whether you choose cloud, on-prem, or hybrid setups.

steps.title: Business Process Mapping & Configuration
steps.description: We align the system with your business processes for finance, operations, procurement, and reporting.

steps.title: Data Migration & Validation
steps.description: We perform safe and accurate migration from legacy systems, spreadsheets, or disconnected databases.

steps.title: Customization & Add-Ons
steps.description: Extend Business One with bespoke enhancements, reports, and dashboard solutions tailored to your workflows.

steps.title: Third-Party Integrations
steps.description: Ensure your SAP Business One environment connects with CRM, eCommerce, BI, payment gateways, and other systems.

steps.title: User Training & Support
steps.description: Structured onboarding, role-based training, and ongoing support to maximize user adoption and ROI.

sap-application:sap-business-one-addon.heading: Our SAP Business One Add-On Development Services

steps.title: Custom Add-On Design & Development
steps.description: We design custom SAP Business One add-ons based on deep business analysis and system architecture review. Each solution is developed to meet specific operational needs while ensuring performance, security, and scalability.

steps.title: Process Automation Add-Ons
steps.description: Our add-ons eliminate manual processes by automating approvals, document handling, inventory workflows, pricing logic, and financial operations — improving efficiency and reducing errors.

steps.title: Reporting & Analytics Add-Ons
steps.description: We build advanced reporting and dashboard add-ons that provide real-time visibility into KPIs, financials, inventory, sales, and operations, enabling data-driven decision-making.

steps.title: Integration Add-Ons
steps.description: Atorix develops add-ons that integrate SAP Business One with third-party applications such as CRM systems, eCommerce platforms, logistics providers, banking systems, tax solutions, and analytics tools.

steps.title: Industry-Specific Add-Ons
steps.description: We develop vertical-focused add-ons tailored to manufacturing, distribution, retail, healthcare, logistics, and professional services — ensuring compliance and process alignment.

steps.title: Enhancement & Optimization of Existing Add-Ons
steps.description: If you already use SAP Business One add-ons, we enhance, optimize, or modernize them for better performance, compatibility, and usability.

steps.title: Dynamics 365 Sales
steps.description: Close deals faster with intelligent forecasting, pipeline visualization, and automated workflows.

steps.title: Dynamics 365 Customer Service
steps.description: Deliver exceptional support with omni-channel tools and advanced case management capabilities.

steps.title: Dynamics 365 Marketing
steps.description: Create personalized customer journeys, manage leads, and track campaign performance.

steps.title: Dynamics 365 Finance & Supply Chain
steps.description: Streamline financial management, inventory, and supply chain operations with real-time insights.

steps.title: Dynamics 365 Field Service
steps.description: Optimize service delivery with real-time technician scheduling, asset tracking, and mobile tools.

steps.title: Dynamics 365 Human Resources
steps.description: Centralize employee data, optimize HR processes, and improve talent management.

steps.title: Dynamics 365 Commerce
steps.description: Deliver unified shopping experiences across channels for seamless customer engagement.

steps.title: Dynamics 365 Project Operations
steps.description: Manage projects end-to-end from planning and execution to billing and financial control.

sap-application:discovery-evaluation.heading: Navigate Success with SAP Discovery & Evaluation
sap-application:discovery-evaluation.intro: Our Discovery & Evaluation offerings help organizations make informed SAP decisions by aligning technology choices with business objectives before execution begins.

steps.title: Solution Envisioning
steps.description: Define the right SAP vision aligned with business goals, future growth plans, and digital transformation objectives.

steps.title: Business Case & Cost Analysis
steps.description: Evaluate ROI, cost drivers, financial feasibility, and value realization to justify SAP investments.

steps.title: Business Process Analysis
steps.description: Assess current business processes and identify optimization opportunities aligned with SAP best practices.

steps.title: IT / IS Planning
steps.description: Align SAP initiatives with overall IT strategy, governance frameworks, and enterprise architecture.

steps.title: Gap & Fitment Analysis
steps.description: Identify gaps and measure alignment between SAP standard capabilities and existing business processes.

steps.title: Migration & Integration Studies
steps.description: Assess feasibility, risks, migration approaches, and integration needs with third-party and legacy systems to ensure a smooth SAP transition.

steps.title: Project Scoping & Sizing
steps.description: Define project scope, effort estimation, timelines, and resource requirements to ensure predictable SAP delivery.
